titleStmt.title: Hocus Pocus Junior The anatomy of legerdemain. Or, The art of iugling set forth in his proper colours, fully, plainly, and exactly; so that an ignorant person may thereby learn the full perfection of the same, after a little practise. Unto each trick is added the figure, where it is needfull for instruction.

Hocus Pocus Junior The anatomy of legerdemain. Or, The art of iugling set forth in his proper colours, fully, plainly, and exactly; so that an ignorant person may thereby learn the full perfection of the same, after a little practise. Unto each trick is added the figure, where it is needfull for instruction.

editionStmt.edition: The third edition, with many additions.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for R. M[ab] and are to be sold by Francis Grove at his shop upon Snow-hill, neer the Sarazens-head,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Running title reads: The art of legerdemain discovered.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
